#include "iostream"
#include "string.h"
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int test;
	cin>>test;
	while (test -- )
	{
		char str[10000];
		cin>>str;
		int l = 0;
		int r = strlen(str)-1;
		int arr[26] = {0};
		int cnt  = 0;
		int cnt1 = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i<strlen(str); i++)
			arr[str[i]-97] = 1;
		for (int i = 0; i<26; i++)
			if(arr[i] == 0)
				cnt = 1;
		while ( r >= l )
		{
			if(str[r] != str[l])
			{
				cnt1 = 1;
				break;
			}
			r--;
			l++;
		}
		if(cnt1==0 && cnt==1 )
			cout<<"palindrome\n";
		else if(cnt == 0 && cnt1 ==0 )
			cout<<"palingram\n";
		else if(cnt1 ==1 && cnt ==0 )
			cout<<"pangram\n";
		else
			cout<<"none\n";




	}
	return 0;
}
